Miss Olivia Marie Ross,

In the summer sun, our bikes took flight,
Across the country, under the gleaming sunlight.
Joined by Illini4000, a journey so grand,
We crossed the bridge, hand in hand.

Our "first" date, a hike to Amphitheater Lake,
17 miles long, memories to make.
Wild flowers bloomed as our love did too,
Blue bells swaying, a symbol so true.

Popcorn snacks and loaves of bread,
Shared laughter, and books are read.
With you, every moment is a sign,
Olivia, will you be my Valentine?
